post.content:
Today we hosted our first "Draw in" event — obviously, in our hometown — Draw in Rio, at the amazing Instituto 12 space in the heart of Leblon.

Thank you very much for everyone that attended! We were _genuinely_ surprised with the amazing AI apps that you have created.

If you didn't manage to come, don't worry! Our next event, Draw in Sampa, will be announced very soon. Please comment here if you'd like to reserve your spot!

Immense praise to Maria Cecilia Marques and Giulia L. who pulled this event out of thin air in about 2 weeks — full with sponsorship and crowded with amazing people. You girls rock! I can't wait to announce our big AI event... 🤫

And as usual, you can take a look at all of the published apps in our community: https://lnkd.in/d889Fgjd
post.title: Draw in Rio: Our First Community AI‑Apps Meetup
post.excerpt: Recap of the inaugural “Draw in Rio” event at Instituto 12, celebrating AI‑app creators and announcing the upcoming Draw in Sampa gathering.
